title: Tasmania's holiday highlands
creator_credit: Brian Merrett and Tasmania. Dept. of Film Production
brief_description: In the heart of Tasmania’s scenic highlands, a wealth of hydro-electric power is produced through twelve dams and power stations linked by rivers, canals, pipelines and tunnels. These beautiful natural and man-made lakes attract tourists of all kinds, especially hikers and salmon fishermen.
